item.title: Outside the Abbey Tavern, 7th December
item.description:
At 4.20pm on 14th November 2025, a commercial waste disposal heavy-duty truck (registration plate VN70 VGJ) parked for several minutes on the kerbstones alongside the Abbey Tavern, collecting rubbish from the pub. After it left, the kerbstones had been flattened down to road level, reflecting the vehicle’s weight. Please can you undertake works to fix these kerbstones and charge the company which owns the truck? Thank you, Cllr Ball

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 124, Kentish Town Road, Kentish Town, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
